title: Luxury in Preston Hollow, Custom Home Features
posting_body: Nestled in one of the most affluent neighborhoods of Dallas between Highway 75 and the Dallas North Tollway, our community offers lavish townhomes and garden style apartments that define luxury living.
Our residence enjoy the neighborhood's close proximity to some of the top private schools in the city, as well as world-class shopping at NorthPark Center.
In addition to the variety of shops found nearby at Lincoln Park Center, Preston-Royal and Preston Center.

Experience French Chateau architecture, opulent apartment homes with slate foyers, granite, gourmet kitchens, garden tub, Washer Dryer, spacious walk in closets, private balconies and, of course, exceptional resident service.
Generous Floor Plans from 902 to 1,885 Sq.
Custom Maple or Cherry Wood Cabinetry
Please Call Desiree with DASH Apartment Locators
